notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All the data are owned by a third party. And all the data are free and accessible. The MODIS land cover product (MCD12C1) is available from https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/dataset_discovery/modis/modis_products_table/mcd12c1; The MODIS ET product is available from http://files.ntsg.umt.edu/data/NTSG_Products/MOD16/; The MLA ET product is available from https://www.bgc-jena.mpg.de/geodb/projects/FileDetails.php; The meteorological data are available from http://hydrology.princeton.edu/data/pgf/; The eddy covariance data of Aral Sea, Balkhash Lake in Kazakhstan, and Fukang station are from CAS Research Center for Ecology and Environment of Central Asia (DOIs: 10.1002/ece3.910; http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jhydrol.2013.08.026); The eddy covariance data of Wulanwusu station are from Wulanwusu Agrometeorological Experiment Station, Shihezi Meteorological Administration (DOIs: 10.1007/s40333-014-0012-x).
